channel.title: Whenever I try to compile my server on a testscape source it says
channel.description:
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Someone please tell me how to fix this. thanks.

item.source: Whenever I try to compile my server on a testscape source it says

item.title: Whenever I try to compile my server on a testscape source it says
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

edit compile and put this in:

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe” server
pause

make sure you have jdk and jre version 1.5 update 8

Read full topic
